statements: SELECT * FROM CrimeData;
SELECT crime_type, crime_location FROM CrimeData WHERE crime_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT crime_id, crime_date, crime_description FROM CrimeData WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery';
SELECT crime_type, COUNT(crime_type) AS crime_count FROM CrimeData GROUP BY crime_type ORDER BY crime_count DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT crime_location FROM CrimeData ORDER BY crime_location ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT crime_id, crime_type, crime_date FROM CrimeData WHERE crime_id < 100 ORDER BY crime_date DESC;
SELECT crime_type, crime_description, report_date FROM CrimeData WHERE crime_location LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CrimeData WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM report_date) = 10 AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM report_date) = 2021;
SELECT crime_id, crime_type, crime_location FROM CrimeData WHERE crime_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY crime_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT crime_type FROM CrimeData WHERE crime_location = 'Park';
SELECT * FROM crimes;
SELECT crime_type, crime_location FROM crimes WHERE crime_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT suspect_name, suspect_age FROM suspects ORDER BY suspect_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM crimes WHERE crime_location LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT suspect_name, crime_type, crime_location FROM suspects JOIN crimes ON suspects.crime_id = crimes.crime_id;
SELECT * FROM crimes WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery';
SELECT crime_type, crime_location FROM crimes WHERE crime_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT crime_type, COUNT(*) AS total_crimes FROM crimes GROUP BY crime_type ORDER BY total_crimes DESC;
SELECT suspects.suspect_name, crimes.crime_type, crimes.crime_location FROM suspects JOIN crimes ON suspects.crime_id = crimes.crime_id WHERE suspects.suspect_age > 30;
SELECT crime_id, crime_type, crime_location FROM crimes WHERE crime_location LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY crime_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM crimes ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT crime_type, location FROM crimes WHERE crime_type='Robbery';
SELECT name, age, occupation FROM suspects WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM investigations WHERE status='Open';
SELECT description FROM crimes WHERE crime_type='Murder';
SELECT name, age, occupation FROM suspects;
SELECT crime_type, location, date FROM crimes WHERE date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM investigations WHERE status = 'open' ORDER BY case_id DESC;
SELECT description FROM crimes WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT name AS suspect_name, occupation AS job FROM suspects WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM crimes;
SELECT crime_type, location FROM crimes WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT description, date FROM crimes WHERE crime_type = 'Assault' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM suspects WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM law_enforcement_agents WHERE department = 'Police' ORDER BY agent_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM crimes WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, age FROM suspects WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age > 30 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT name, department FROM law_enforcement_agents WHERE badge_number >= 1000 ORDER BY department, name;
SELECT crimes.location, crime_reports.status FROM crimes INNER JOIN crime_reports ON crimes.crime_id = crime_reports.crime_id WHERE crime_reports.status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM crime_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CrimeReports;
SELECT report_id, report_date, crime_type FROM CrimeReports WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery';
SELECT name, age, address, gender FROM Suspects WHERE age > 25;
SELECT report_date, location, statement FROM VictimReports WHERE crime_type = 'Assault' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT officer_name, department, rank FROM LawEnforcement WHERE department = 'Police Department';
SELECT * FROM CrimeReports ORDER BY report_date DESC, crime_type ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM CrimeReports GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT report_id, report_date, crime_type, location FROM CrimeReports WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery' OR crime_type = 'Burglary'
SELECT name, age, address, gender FROM Suspects WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND gender = 'M' ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT * FROM VictimReports WHERE location LIKE '%Park%'
